cab.content: Military Secret.1001IfFrom, Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,17th July 1919.mjl *MAhj ji (Repeated by Commander-in-Chief in India to Constantinople.) ' rl . (Received 19th.)9o84. 17th. Malleson wires 15th July :-" Transcaspia situation. On 11th July headquarters was at Bakharden 73 miles east of Kizil Arvat. Transcaspians hold bridge at Keliata, which is however prepared / for demolition; railway in front destroyed. Askabad now reported quiet. Bolshevik ' cavalry occupy town."
